data: {"generalSituation":"The weather over the coastal areas of Guangdong will be mainly fine in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day. A replenishment of the northeast monsoon will reach the coast of southern China on Sunday. It will be windier on Monday and Tuesday at first, and temperatures will fall slightly. With the monsoon moderating, temperatures over the region will rise midweek next week. Under the influence of another dry replenishment of the monsoon, temperatures over the coast of Guangdong are expected to fall again during Christmas holidays. It will be cool in the morning and at night over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251220","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods at first.
